info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:53PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Winds over 40 mph and accumulating small hail will impact portions of central Bingham County through 430 PM MDT... At 351 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from Firth to Rockford, or 9 miles west of Blackfoot, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and accumulating pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blackfoot, Firth, Rockford, Moreland, Rose, Fort Hall Eagle Lodge, Fort Hall Lincoln Creek Lodge, Pingree, Groveland, Basalt and Wapello. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
